name: Kelsey Grammer As Frasier Crane Twice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: The guys at 'Cheers' embarrass Frasier by taking him out on a hunt. What is he hunting for?
questions.explanation:
Snipe.

	City boy in the country.

questions.text: Diane walks out on Frasier just as they are to be married. Where does this happen?
questions.explanation:
Italy.

	It could have been romantic, but ...

questions.text: Frasier's mentor gets involved with Carla. Who is he?
questions.explanation:
Bennett Ludlow.

	Woodrow is 'Woody'. Lance was a romantic interest of Diane's. Sloan is the fellow who walked out on Diane in the opening episode.

questions.text: Frasier and Lilith take their baby to the bar - where he says his first word. What is it?
Lilith tries to make Frasier jealous by going to Cape Cod. Who does she go with?
Frasier and Niles go into business together. What kind of business is it?
questions.explanation:
Restaurant.

	A fancy restaurant - but it doesn't quite work out.

questions.text: Frasier has a disturbing dream that he is in bed with this person.
questions.explanation:
Gil Chesterton.

	The original odd couple.

questions.text: Frasier has a romantic involvement with which actress?
questions.explanation:
Sela Ward.

	More than just Sprint.

questions.text: Frasier decorates his apartment with great style - except for one piece of furniture. What is it?
Frasier's romance with an author goes downhill because ...?
questions.correct: He doesn't want to write an introduction to her book
options: He doesn't want to have her book dedicated to him
He wants to be a co-author
He refuses to read the book
questions.explanation:
He doesn't want to write an introduction to her book.

	He doesn't go for her psychological approach.
